title: Transactions & Advanced Features
description: Build a production-ready banking transaction system using MongoDB's advanced features including multi-document transactions, change streams, GridFS, and enterprise-grade error handling.
short_description: Master MongoDB advanced features by building a banking transaction system
learning_objectives: Use change streams for real-time data monitoring
Implement GridFS for large file storage
Build production-grade error handling and retry logic
Handle concurrent operations and race conditions
Implement audit logging and compliance features
real_world_connection: Advanced MongoDB features are essential for financial systems, enterprise applications, and mission-critical platforms. This challenge teaches the skills used by senior engineers at banks, fintech companies, and enterprise software providers.
requirements: Build real-time balance monitoring with change streams
Build retry logic for transient failures
